verses.verse: We have heard <S%H8085><s%> with our ears <S%H241><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, our fathers <S%H1><s%> have told <S%H5608><s%> us <S%H6467><s%>, what work you did <S%H6466><s%> in their days <S%H3117><s%>, in the times <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>.

How you did drive out <S%H3423><s%> the heathen <S%H1471><s%> with your hand <S%H3027><s%>, and plant <S%H5193><s%> them <S%H7489><s%>; how you did afflict the people <S%H3816><s%>, and cast them out <S%H7971><s%>.

For they got <S%H3423><s%> not the land <S%H776><s%> in possession <S%H3423><s%> by their own sword <S%H2719><s%>, neither did their own arm <S%H2220><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> them <S%H3225><s%>: but your right hand, and your arm <S%H2220><s%>, and the light <S%H216><s%> of your favor <S%H6440><s%>, because you had a favor unto them <S%H7521><s%>.
You are my King <S%H4428><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>: command <S%H6680><s%> deliverances <S%H3444><s%> for Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
Through you will we push down <S%H5055><s%> our enemies <S%H6862><s%>: through your name <S%H8034><s%> will we tread them under <S%H947><s%> that rise up against us <S%H6965><s%>.
For I will not trust <S%H982><s%> in my bow <S%H7198><s%>, neither shall my sword <S%H2719><s%> save me <S%H3467><s%>.
But you have saved <S%H3467><s%> us from our enemies <S%H6862><s%>, and have put them to shame <S%H954><s%> that hated us <S%H8130><s%>.
In God <S%H430><s%> we boast <S%H1984><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H3034><s%>, and praise your name <S%H8034><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
But <S%H637><s%> you have cast off <S%H2186><s%>, and put us to shame <S%H3637><s%>; and go not forth <S%H3318><s%> with our armies <S%H6635><s%>.
You make us to turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H268><s%> from the enemy <S%H6862><s%>: and they which hate <S%H8130><s%> us plunder for themselves <S%H8154><s%>.
You have given <S%H5414><s%> us like sheep <S%H6629><s%> appointed for food <S%H3978><s%>; and have scattered <S%H2219><s%> us among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>.
You sell <S%H4376><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> for nothing <S%H1952><s%>, and do not increase <S%H7235><s%> your wealth by their price <S%H4242><s%>.
You make <S%H7760><s%> us a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to our neighbors <S%H7934><s%>, a scorn <S%H3933><s%> and a derision <S%H7047><s%> to them that are round about us <S%H5439><s%>.
You make <S%H7760><s%> us a byword <S%H4912><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, a shaking <S%H4493><s%> of the head <S%H7218><s%> among the people <S%H3816><s%>.
My confusion <S%H3639><s%> is continually <S%H3117><s%> before me <S%H1322><s%>, and the shame of my face <S%H6440><s%> has covered me <S%H3680><s%>,
For the voice <S%H6963><s%> of him that blasphemes <S%H2778><s%> and blasphemes <S%H1442><s%>; by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> and avenger <S%H5358><s%>.
All this is come <S%H935><s%> upon us <S%H7911><s%>; yet have we not forgotten you <S%H8266><s%>, neither have we dealt falsely in your covenant <S%H1285><s%>.
Our heart <S%H3820><s%> is not turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%>, neither have our steps <S%H838><s%> declined <S%H5186><s%> from your way <S%H734><s%>;
Though you have severely broken <S%H1794><s%> us in the place <S%H4725><s%> of dragons <S%H8577><s%>, and covered <S%H3680><s%> us with the shadow of death <S%H6757><s%>.
If we have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of our God <S%H430><s%>, or stretched out <S%H6566><s%> our hands <S%H3709><s%> to a strange <S%H2114><s%> god <S%H410><s%>;
Shall not God <S%H430><s%> search this out <S%H2713><s%>? for he knows <S%H3045><s%> the secrets <S%H8587><s%> of the heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Yes <S%H2026><s%>, for your sake are we killed all the day <S%H3117><s%> long <S%H2803><s%>; we are counted as sheep <S%H6629><s%> for the slaughter <S%H2878><s%>.
Awake <S%H5782><s%>, why sleep <S%H3462><s%> you <S%H136><s%>, O Lord? arise <S%H6974><s%>, cast us not off <S%H2186><s%> for ever <S%H5331><s%>.
Therefore hide <S%H5641><s%> you your face <S%H6440><s%>, and forget <S%H7911><s%> our affliction <S%H6040><s%> and our oppression <S%H3906><s%>?
For our soul <S%H5315><s%> is bowed down <S%H7743><s%> to the dust <S%H6083><s%>: our belly <S%H990><s%> clings <S%H1692><s%> unto the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Arise <S%H6965><s%> for our help <S%H5833><s%>, and redeem <S%H6299><s%> us for your mercies <S%H2617><s%>' sake.
